relativeUrl.value: @concat(pipeline().parameters.zoho_api_base, '/api/v3/portal/', pipeline().parameters.PortalId, '/projects?page=', string(variables('sv_page')), '&per_page=', string(variables('sv_per_page')), if(equals(variables('lastRunDate'), ''), '', concat('&lastModifiedTime=', variables('lastRunDate'))))
